name: Timber (BoatTK)
description:
Controls:

Space/A - Pickup/Drop Logs, Toggle Fire, Enter/Leave Bushes

Esc - Quit Game

How To Play:

You Must Survive The Night In The Freezing Cold While Being Hunted By A Monster. The Monster Is Attracted To Noise, So Be As Quiet As Possible. Add Logs To Your Fire To Keep It Alive, Toggle The Fire On And Off To Hide From The Monster, And Stay Near The Fire To Stay Warm.

Credits:

BoatTK - Programming

Esteban - Sprite Animations

Lucas - GUI

Ash - Character Art

Nur - Monster/GUI Art

Yoli - Environmental Art

Sterling - SFX

Andy - Music

Cristian - SFX & Music

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
